artist: Artist: Henri Matisse; Printer: Mourlot Freres, Paris; Printer: Draeger Frères, Paris, France; Publisher: Tériade, Paris, France
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
image_copyright: © Succession H. Matisse %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
medium: Color lithographs, heliogravure in black and white, and lithographic illustrations; bound volume
provenance: Ruth and Bruce Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1991.
text: Four years after Matisse's death, his publisher, Tériade, devoted this penultimate Verve issue to works from the artist's final years. By means of color lithography Tériade reproduced several of Matisse’s monumental gouache cut-outs, further publicizing these remarkable late works.
title: Verve, Dernières oeuvres de Matisse 1950-1954 (Vol. IX, nos. 35-36)
